Changes to core files:
----------------------

Convert Location to Employee
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
1. script/langEN.js changed all 'location' to 'employee'
2. script/script.js line 1619 changed 'Location' to 'Employee'
